page.title: 10PENICUIK HIGH SCHOOL
page.content: The original building was opened in {1937 as a Primary/Junior Secondary.}It changed to a{full Senior Secondary in {1958}and has had many extension to it since. Until the opening of Beeslack in August 1984 it was the only High School in Penicuik. It had{1700 pupils in 1983/84 which{reduced to 1262}in 1984/85 when the{teaching staff {numbered 120. It offers a wide selection of subjects to the{Higher Grade- in 84/85 152 {pupils sat Maths ,171 sat English and {1 sat Italian. The{Physical Education Department}runs a variety of extra-curricular activity including their own{Athletics Championships. Sporting events in competition with other schools are {badminton, basketball, cricket, cross {country, dance,golf,gymnastics,hockey, {rugby, skiing, soccer and swimming.
